thread.title: BRIEF-Gastar Exploration Appoints Harry Quarls To Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gastar Exploration Appoints Harry Quarls To Board
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Gastar Exploration Inc:
* GASTAR EXPLORATION ANNOUNCES NEW INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR * GASTAR EXPLORATION INC - BOARD HAS APPOINTED HARRY QUARLS TO BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
